body.p: Multiple networks as defined in are used in this example configuration. IP addresses are assigned consistently on hosts that require access to multiple networks. An /etc/hosts file is used for hostname resolution on the storage network.
body.note:
This solution does not scale, and a larger name resolution system is recommended for larger or production deployments. Network Configuration
